sentence: The ______ ship can travel across the Pacific Ocean.
sentence_translation: 这艘远洋的船能穿越太平洋。

sentence: The new ______ at the museum features ancient artifacts.
sentence_translation: 博物馆的新展览以古代文物为特色。

sentence: ______ salmon return to their birthplace to spawn.
sentence_translation: 成熟的三文鱼回到它们的出生地产卵。

sentence: We had grilled ______ with lemon for dinner.
sentence_translation: 我们晚餐吃了柠檬烤三文鱼。

sentence: These birds ______ in the spring when food is abundant.
sentence_translation: 这些鸟在食物充足的春天繁殖。

sentence: The ______ of the eggs takes about three weeks.
sentence_translation: 这些蛋的孵化大约需要三周时间。

sentence: The rabbit made a quick ______ into the bush to escape the fox.
sentence_translation: 兔子迅速飞奔到灌木丛中躲避狐狸。

sentence: The river is full of fish ______ during the breeding season.
sentence_translation: 繁殖季节，河里满是鱼卵。

sentence: They need to ______ permission before starting the project.
sentence_translation: 他们在启动项目前需要获得许可。

sentence: A troop of ______ was spotted near the waterhole.
sentence_translation: 在水坑附近发现了一群狒狒。

sentence: Lions are one of the top ______ in the African savanna.
sentence_translation: 狮子是非洲稀树草原的顶级捕食者之一。

sentence: The villagers sounded an ______ when the storm approached.
sentence_translation: 暴风雨来临时，村民们发出了警告。

sentence: The ______ of the virus was controlled by strict measures.
sentence_translation: 通过严格措施控制了病毒的传播。

sentence: The deer went out for ______ in the early morning.
sentence_translation: 鹿在清晨出去觅食。

sentence: Mother birds ______ their chicks with worms and insects.
sentence_translation: 母鸟用蠕虫和昆虫喂养雏鸟。

sentence: The monkey spent hours on ______ to keep its fur clean.
sentence_translation: 这只猴子花了几个小时打理毛发，保持皮毛干净。

sentence: Geese ______ south every winter to avoid the cold.
sentence_translation: 鹅每年冬天迁徙到南方躲避寒冷。

sentence: The lake provides ______ for the surrounding villages.
sentence_translation: 这个湖为周边村庄提供淡水。

sentence: Adaptability is key to ______ in harsh environments.
sentence_translation: 适应性是在恶劣环境中生存的关键。

sentence: The company will ______ close during the renovation.
sentence_translation: 公司在翻新期间将暂时关闭。

sentence: The water tank has a ______ of 500 liters.
sentence_translation: 这个水箱的容量是500升。

sentence: The ______ of resources should be fair to all teams.
sentence_translation: 资源的分配应对所有团队公平。

sentence: Plants ______ through seeds or cuttings.
sentence_translation: 植物通过种子或插条繁殖。

sentence: Hard work can help you ______ your dreams.
sentence_translation: 努力工作能帮助你实现梦想。

sentence: The storm ______ the normal operation of the airport.
sentence_translation: 暴风雨扰乱了机场的正常运营。

sentence: The two species have ______ characteristics that are easy to tell apart.
sentence_translation: 这两个物种有明显不同的特征，很容易区分。

sentence: The butterfly's bright ______ helps it attract mates.
sentence_translation: 蝴蝶鲜艳的颜色有助于它吸引配偶。

sentence: Scientists ______ new technology to study climate change.
sentence_translation: 科学家使用新技术研究气候变化。

sentence: The owl silently hunted for ______ in the dark.
sentence_translation: 猫头鹰在黑暗中静静地捕食猎物。

sentence: Bees carry ______ from one flower to another, helping plants reproduce.
sentence_translation: 蜜蜂将花粉从一朵花带到另一朵花，帮助植物繁殖。

sentence: Honey is made from the ______ of flowers by bees.
sentence_translation: 蜂蜜是蜜蜂用花的花蜜制成的。

sentence: This forest is home to many rare ______ of plants and animals.
sentence_translation: 这片森林是许多珍稀动植物物种的家园。

sentence: Young children are more ______ to diseases than adults.
sentence_translation: 幼儿比成人更易受疾病侵害。

sentence: Most ______ ______ fish cannot live in freshwater.
sentence_translation: 大多数盐水鱼不能生活在淡水中。

sentence: People ______ ______ ______ are required to have regular health checks.
sentence_translation: 某个年龄段的人需要定期体检。

sentence: Food, water, and shelter are basic ______ ______ for all living things.
sentence_translation: 食物、水和住所是所有生物的基本生存需求。

sentence: The government took action ______ ______ ______ public concerns.
sentence_translation: 政府响应公众关切采取了行动。

sentence: They ______ ______ various outdoor activities during the vacation.
sentence_translation: 他们在假期从事各种户外活动。

sentence: She ______ ______ learn a new language every year.
sentence_translation: 她每年尝试学习一门新语言。

sentence: The animal's ______ ______ help it survive in cold climates.
sentence_translation: 这种动物的身体特征帮助它在寒冷气候中生存。

sentence: Camouflage is a common ______ ______ used by many animals.
sentence_translation: 伪装是许多动物使用的常见防御机制。

sentence: Butterflies and bees ______ ______ between flowers as they feed.
sentence_translation: 蝴蝶和蜜蜂在觅食时在花之间传播花粉。

sentence: There are only ______ ______ ______ tickets available for the concert.
sentence_translation: 这场音乐会只有有限的数量的票可供购买。

sentence: The villages in the mountain area are ______ ______ ______ from each other.
sentence_translation: 山区的村庄彼此散布得很远。

sentence: The crowd ______ ______ across the square to watch the performance.
sentence_translation: 人群在广场上扩散开来观看表演。

sentence: The wolves went out to ______ ______ ______ when night fell.
sentence_translation: 夜幕降临时，狼群出去觅食。

sentence: The tree will take about ten years to ______ ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 这棵树大约需要十年才能长到完全大小。

sentence: The small fish ______ ______ ______ ______ ______ when they saw a shark.
sentence_translation: 小鱼看到鲨鱼时迅速回到安全处。

sentence: The aquarium displays a variety of ______ ______ from the deep ocean.
sentence_translation: 水族馆展示了各种来自深海的海洋生物。
